ygData.subject: Re: Qeynos Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah this is a fun quest indeed. Look for Valen in the south karanas(go south to southwest while in there also) and you find him. Once you give him the flute you
ygData.messageBody:
Ah this is a fun quest indeed. Look for Valen in the south karanas(go
south to southwest while in there also) and you find him. Once you give
him the flute you will receive a letter that you must return back for
some recompensation, forget what off top of my head. Most bards wait
till higher level to do this(wandering across it when going to
splitpaw), and it is not beneficial to them.

Talonus
Solusek Ro bard of the world

>
> Maraxus (lvl 14 Bard)
